traits.Nimble Escape: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.Dagger: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Light Crossbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
